```scss
// Property: defaults
// Description: Specifies which values should be taken from the defaults.
// Component(s): Ti.Android.Notification
'.defaults-all': { defaults: Ti.Android.DEFAULT_ALL }
'.defaults-lights': { defaults: Ti.Android.DEFAULT_LIGHTS }
'.defaults-sound': { defaults: Ti.Android.DEFAULT_SOUND }
'.defaults-vibrate': { defaults: Ti.Android.DEFAULT_VIBRATE }
```
